labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The chat box is not focused anymore and you have to click in the chat box again to write again.
data.expected_result: It shouldn't go out of focus, it should allow you to type again after you left the window (or stops clicking stuff)
data.short_description: The text box goes out of focus if you click anywhere outside the box. (Does not happen on PTB or Stable)
data.steps_to_repro: - Write a message - Click on a user in the member list, inside a channel, join a voice channel or mute your mic
